title: Short Bomb!
alternative_title: Mochizuki Minetarou Tanpenshuu Short Bomb! ; Short Bomb! Minetaro Mochizuki Short Story Collection ; Short Bomb! Minetaro Mochizuki Short Story Collection

description:
Description :
        A humorous collection of 3 short stories by Minetaro Mochizuki, all taking place in the same town about the misadventures of a very poor girl.
